content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT census_file_format
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE census_external_table
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE census_external_table
(
    decennialTime varchar(20),
    stateName varchar(100),
    countyName varchar(100),
    population int,
    race varchar(50),
    sex    varchar(10),
    minAge int,
    maxAge int
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'censusdatacontainer/release/us_population_county/year=20*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = AzureOpenData, --population_ds,  
    FILE_FORMAT = census_file_format
)
GO

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM census_external_table

GO

-- utilizar CETAS con select desde la tabla externa 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE population_by_year_state
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'aggregated_data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = adlsv2,  
    FILE_FORMAT = census_file_format
)  
AS
SELECT decennialTime, stateName, SUM(population) AS population
FROM census_external_table
GROUP BY decennialTime, stateName
GO

-- Podemos consultarla
SELECT * FROM population_by_year_state
